title: ACH Analysis
subtitle: Analysis of Competing Hypotheses - Structured intelligence methodology

empty.title: No Analyses Found
empty.descriptionStart: Start your intelligence analysis by creating your first ACH matrix.
empty.descriptionFilter: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters.

alerts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this analysis? This will also delete all hypotheses, evidence links, and scores.
alerts.removeEvidenceConfirm: Remove this evidence from the analysis?
alerts.evidenceHint: Navigate to Evidence Library to add evidence items, then link them to this analysis.

framework.context: ACH is an eight-step procedure grounded in cognitive psychology used by intelligence analysts to identify a set of possible hypotheses, evaluate data that is consistent and inconsistent with each, and select the hypothesis that best fits the data.
